thread.title: Obama says Assad must go, revs up coalition against ISIS
thread.title_full: Obama says Assad must go, revs up coalition against ISIS | News24

author: news24.com
title: Obama says Assad must go, revs up coalition against ISIS
text:
New York - US President Barack Obama said on Tuesday that Syrian leader Bashar Assad must go if ISIS is to be defeated, as he rallied world leaders to revitalise the coalition campaign against the jihadists.
French authorities, meanwhile, have launched a criminal probe of the Assad regime for alleged war crimes committed between 2011 and 2013, sources said.
A day after clashing with Russian President Vladimir Putin over how to handle the crisis in Syria, Obama hosted a counterterrorism summit at the United Nations to take stock of the one-year air war against ISIS fighters in Iraq and Syria.
"In Syria... defeating ISIS requires, I believe, a new leader," Obama told the gathering, held on the sidelines of the UN General Assembly.
